DOCNAME: CASE OF YILMAZ AND BARIM v. TURKEY
CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1 (composition of state security court);Not necessary to examine other complaints under Art. 6
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants were born in DATE and DATE respectively . They were serving their prison sentences at Bergama prison at the time of the application .
CARDINAL . The applicants were arrested and taken into police custody by police officers at the LAW - terror branch of ORG on DATE respectively .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ordered the applicants’ remand in custody .

CARDINAL . On DATE the public prosecutor at ORG filed a bill of indictment with that court and accused the applicants and CARDINAL other suspects of membership in an illegal organisation , namely the PERSON ( ORG İhtilalci Komünistler Birliği ) . He requested that the applicants be convicted and sentenced under LAW § CARDINAL of LAW and LAW no . ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG convicted the applicants as charged and sentenced them to DATE and QUANTITY months’ imprisonment .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG held a hearing and upheld the judgment of the first - instance court .

CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law and practice in force at the material time are outlined in the following judgments : PERSON v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE ) , and GPE v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL , § § CARDINAL , DATE ) .
CARDINAL . By PERSON no . CARDINAL of DATE , published in ORG on DATE , ORG have been abolished .
